text: Emyr Humphreys (15 April 1919 - 30 September 2020) was a Welsh novelist and poet. During his long bilingual writing career, he published over twenty novels. They include A Toy Epic (1958), Outside the House of Baal (1965), and The Land of the Living Humphreys died on 30 September 2020 at the age of 101. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2020 deaths Category:British centenarians Category:Welsh novelists Category:Welsh poets
title: Emyr Humphreys
